amendment.description: Amendment to require an evaluation of each alternative in an environmental impact statement or environmental assessment to identify potential effects on low-income communities and communities of color.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-261 to require an evaluation of each alternative in an environmental impact statement or environmental assessment to identify potential effects on low-income communities and communities of color.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 320 - 88 (Roll no. 509).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 320 - 88 (Roll no. 509).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
